EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners (1317222476.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi John,
I spoke with Juli on Monday about the process and she said at that time she was waiting to get our contract back from their department that was reviewing it and I should get it shortly but I have not yet received it back. She did say though that they only had one real concern that I think we will be able to address so unless there are multiple issues with the contract it should be easy to complete. If I do not get anything from Juli by the end of the day I will reach out to her again to get a status update. Is there anything else you have any questions about?
Thanks! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: John Fittipaldi [mailto:johnfitti@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, September 28, 2011 11:00 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners
Nicolette,
I'm checking in to see where we currently stand?
John
--- On Thu, 9/22/11, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners To: "Juli MacDonald-Wimbush" <jmacdonald@marstel-day.com> Cc: "John Fittipaldi" <johnfitti@yahoo.com> Date: Thursday, September 22, 2011, 2:45 PM Hi Juli,
Thank you for your response! I look forward to speaking with you on Monday.
Have a great weekend, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: Juli MacDonald-Wimbush [mailto:jmacdonald@marstel-day.com] Sent: Thursday, September 22, 2011 12:54 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: John Fittipaldi Subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners
Nicollete,
Thanks for the note. The contract is being reviewed by our deputy general counsel and I hope to have his comments or approval of the agreement by the end of the week.
I will sign up for an morning slot on Monday, 26 September to talk you about the process for adding task orders to the agreement once it is in place.
Best, Juli
Juli MacDonald-Wimbush, Partner Marstel-Day, LLC Cell: 571-295-2882 Phone: 703-778-6560 Email: jmacdonald@marstel-day.com

From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Thursday, September 22, 2011 9:42 AM To: Juli MacDonald-Wimbush Cc: John Fittipaldi Subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners
Hi Juli,
I hope your week is going well! I wanted to follow up to get a status update on your review of our Master Service Agreement. Please let me know if there are any questions I can answer for you and I look forward to hearing from you.
Have a great day! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: Juli MacDonald-Wimbush [mailto:jmacdonald@marstel-day.com] Sent: Thursday, September 15, 2011 10:50 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: John Fittipaldi Subject: RE: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners
Dear Nicolette,
Apologies for my delayed response. Thank you for the contract. We will review it and get back to you by early next week.
I would like to set up a time to talk you after we signed the contract about setting up the task orders. I envision that we will have an umbrella strategic advisory task order with John Fittipaldi that would give us access to his services on an as needed basis.
I will look forward to working with you and John.
Best, Juli
Juli MacDonald-Wimbush, Partner Marstel-Day, LLC Cell: 571-295-2882 Phone: 703-778-6560 Email: jmacdonald@marstel-day.com

From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, September 07, 2011 4:36 PM To: Juli MacDonald-Wimbush Cc: John Fittipaldi Subject: Marstel Day_John Fittipaldi_MBO Partners
Hi Julie,
On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. John mentioned to me that you are familiar with the MBO Partners program due to your past work with Booz Allen, but if you have any questions about our program I would be happy to speak with you and you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here:
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Attached is the standard agreement we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
For more information on MBO Partners click here: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf
Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you.
Have a great day, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: John Fittipaldi [mailto:johnfitti@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, September 07, 2011 11:39 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Julie Macdonald Winbush Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Nicolette,
OK, I had a substantial conversation with Marstel Day this morning. It appears that they will want to establish a working consultative relationship with me.
Juli MacDonald Winbush will be the point of contact for Marstel Day with MBO Partners.
I've completed the enrollment process and signed the agreement. The proverbial ball is now in your court. Please advise if I can answer any questions that might arise.
Regards,
John
From: "ntaylor@mbopartners.com" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: johnfitti@yahoo.com Sent: Tuesday, September 6, 2011 6:03 PM Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear John, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become a MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. Please begin enrollment by clicking here. Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you.
